content: a set of 3 1 large 2 small ruffled doilies with 3-dim daffodils attached vintage pattern does not give yardage of balls of crochet cotton **sizes ** * large doily 18 inches 45 7 cm * small doily 12 inches 30 5 cm **materials ** * 1 ball dk yellow * 1 ball bright nile green * 2 balls lt yellow * 3 balls white * steel crochet hook size 13 * stamens
